name: Consejo General de Colegios Oficiales de Farmacéuticos de España
goal:
The General Council is the representative, coordination and executive body of the Official Colleges of Pharmacists of Spain, at the state level and internationally, and has, for all purposes, the status of public law corporation with legal personality and capacity to fulfill its purposes.

Its purposes are established by law, in particular, the exclusive representation, management and advocacy for the profession at the state level and internationally, and the protection of the interests of consumers and users.

It is the official representative of the Pharmaceutical regional Chambers to the Central Government and public bodies linked to or dependent on it,

Promoting, by all means at its disposal, the continuous improvement of scientific levels, cultural, economic and social development of members and collaboration with public authorities in promoting the right to health of citizens.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All legal dossiers linked to the pharmacy profession.
